main: Nya-hallo! You seem like you've grown much stronger.
branch_1: As do all of your kind.
There is a cave that's said to have been the Daimaou's training ground. Deep within is a sword with an everlasting curse.
If you're willing to dive into the depths of darkness then you will know immense power.
branch_2: Nyaaa... The Ashura-O has been getting uppity as of late. Not content with his station in life, he has taken the Daimaou's tower.
